caption.p: ( a) CVT-grown single crystals of BiTeI. The squares are 1 × 1 mm 2 in size. ( b) LEED pattern for saturation coverage of BiI 3 on Bi 2Se 3 collected at 34 eV kinetic energy. Hexagons indicate the first order spots of the Bi 2Se 3 substrate and BiI 3, which approximately forms a √3 × √3 superstructure.
